2025 Pittsburgh Pirates Statistics

2024 Season

Record: 29-45, 5th place in NL_Central (Schedule and Results)

Playoff Odds: <0.1% to make postseason, <0.1% to win World Series

Managers: Derek Shelton (12-26) and Don Kelly (17-19)

General Manager: Ben Cherington (Executive VP, Baseball Ops & GM)

Farm Director: John Baker

Scouting Director: Joe DelliCarri

Ballpark: PNC Park

Attendance: 660,427 (14th of 15)

Park Factors: (Over 100 favors batters, under 100 favors pitchers.)
    Multi-year: Batting - 102, Pitching - 103
    One-year: Batting - 102, Pitching - 103

Pythagorean W-L: 30-44, 235 Runs, 293 Runs Allowed
